entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to publish views of a Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web project #36716
  • blazor = RenderFragment + MarkupString #36714
  • Perf improvement: caching, connectionclosehttps, mvc #36713
  • Behavior is different to what is documented - IFormCollection.Item[String] Property #36712
  • NETSDK1082 There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'browser-wasm' #36711
  • VS2022 Preview 4 Very high CPU Consumption even when Idle #36710
  • Blazor project debugger only breaks on `onchange` event when `onblur` and `onchange` both specified in a text input, and breakpoints are set for both handlers. #36709
  • Running .NET 6 RC1 web application built with the current Angular SPA template generates an [HPM] error after second proxied request #36707
  • Blazor WebAssembly - How can I add a new *.razor page that don't need to recompile or build the project #36704
  • We need better way to deal with css animations. Reliable OnAnimationEnd, allow element to force re-render or something. #36700
  • Closing / Reopening same solution 3-4x + results in Razor SolutionClosing state being invalid #36697
    17.0-Preview5
  • Include AddEndpointsApiExplorer in ASP.NET Core Web API template By default #36696
  • Race condition with component using @ref for cascading value to another component ? #36693
  • Cancel TagHelper resolution on solution close #36692
    17.0-Preview5

Closed

  • .NET 6 rc and Blazor Web Assembly Publish fails from Visual Studio #36641
  • Use SslApplicationProtocol.Http3 constant #36668
    7.0-preview1
  • Unable to publish views of a Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web project #36583
  • WorkerService detect appsettings.json changes #36708
  • MSB3277 warnings when referencing Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core and System.Security.Cryptography.Cng #36619
  • Startup regression: plaintext #36611
  • RC1 Failed connection handshake after update from Preview 7 -> RC1 #36672
  • Blocking detected with the framework #36705
  • Issue with running docker-compose on .NET 6 RC1 #36646
  • Blazor Server - Cannot find the fallback endpoint specified by route values: { page: /_Host, area: } exception with RC1 #36535
  • Perf regression: plaintext #36594
  • Building a 5.0 app with 6.0 SDK in VS 2019 causes analyzers to fail to load #36552
    6.0.0
  • Add out-of-proc test for request queue delegation #28396
    6.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Make `deactivate` clean x86 root #36717
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Retarget DOTNETHOME when installing x64 on ARM64 #36695
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Find inherited TryParse and BindAsync #36694
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Revert Enforce WebSockets Transport for Blazor #36656
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • Use SslApplicationProtocol.Http3 #36702
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [Release/6.0-rc2] Fix and test HttpSys delegation #36698
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • open DI in F# webapi project template #36683
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Pin analyzers that ship in the SDK #36690
    7.0-preview1
  • Fix and test HttpSys delegation #36677
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Update BlazorServerApp Sample Project #36684
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Always use latest targeting packs #36718
    area-infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #36657
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Catch exception in TryConvertTo #33594
    area-blazor, community-contribution, .NET 7 Planning
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Use minimal APIs for F# project templates #36660
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc
  • Find inherited TryParse and BindAsync #36688
    area-web-frameworks
